Package sawfowl.commandpack.api.commands.parameterized

Interface ParameterizedCommand

All Superinterfaces:
org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandExecutor, PluginCommand
All Known Subinterfaces:
ParameterizedPlayerCommand
public interface ParameterizedCommand extends PluginCommand, org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandExecutor
This interface is designed to simplify the creation of commands and add additional functionality to them.
